Author: MikoS
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO] DLS Academy - Decentralized Learning System
Body: DLS Academy  [img=center]https://i.imgur.com/SY987vi.png[/img]        WEBSITE   FACEBOOK   TWITTER   REDDIT   TELEGRAM   GITHUB   BLOG     DLSAcademy is a tool that offers all you need for your professional growth, and also a way to share knowledge and get paid (or not). We are a trustless platform, which means you don’t need to trust us with your money. The payment layer is built on open source Ethereum smart contracts, so everything is transparent and guaranteed to work as expected. We are aware of the current difficulty in using cryptocurrencies and we are working hard to solve this issue through a nice and simple UX, while not compromising on security.   https://i.imgur.com/IVrY2Qx.png   ICO is live Check NOW       A bonus of 30% applies to contributions of at least 3 ETH (eg: For a contribution of 3 ETH in the first week someone will receive 3 * 17500 * 1.3 = 68250 DLT);        https://i.imgur.com/Cq7s9Zm.png   Technology Stack   Ethereum Smart Contracts IPFS  Blockchain-based open source platform for building decentralized applications (Dapps). A new generation of applications that run on the blockchain, thus providing transparency, censorship-resistance, security and availability. Even more, because these applications run on the same blockchain, integrations between them will be trivial in most cases, so the more Dapps will be built, the more powerful they will become.  The backbone of DLS Academy is built on Ethereum smart contracts, written in Solidity language. All the core functionalities like transparent payments, reputation system, voting mechanism, governance model and even content storage will eventually be built on Ethereum and will take advantage of the rich ecoystem that was built around it, like ENS and Swarm. Our team is looking forward to new projects on Ethereum and we will constantly try to build integrations with other projects when it makes sense. IPFS aims to replace HTTP and build a better, decentralized web by offering high speed content delivery, eliminating duplicates of data in the network, making important content persistent throughout history and uses cryptography in order to provide security and privacy. The latter is the reason why IPFS is easy to integrate with blockchains, and Ethereum would be a perfect match thanks to smart contracts. For example, IPFS “links” (by which a file can be identified within the network) can be stored in a smart contract, and thus being timestamped and secured. WHY DECENTRALISED APPLICATIONS?   HOW IT WORKS  https://i.imgur.com/riTw64P.png

Author: MikoS
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO] DLS Academy - Decentralized Learning System
Body: Thank you for your interest and feedback! According to our financial advisors if we raise 10.000 ether is enough to deliver the final product! We see lots of interesting projects having their ICOs but they are driven by greed. Remember important projects how much they raised during their ICOs? Like Aragon, Gnosis, Bat etc. Now is everything about raising more and more ether during ICOs and not focusing on delivering a product!

Author: MikoS
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO] DLS Academy - Decentralized Learning System
Body: Thank you for your interest and feedback! BtiJob is a different project than what we want to deliver! Btijobs is like e-jobs and other platforms of finding a new job. We want to deliver a better version of Udemy or Pluralsight on a decentralized platform!

Author: MikoS
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO] DLS Academy - Decentralized Learning System
Body: Thank you for your interest! Our ICO is open! You can check it here http://dlsacademy.io/ico/ There are 3 more days for 75% bonus and don't forget about the extra 30% bonus for minimum contributions of 3 eth.

Author: MikoS
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO] DLS Academy - Decentralized Learning System
Body: Thank you for your interest and feedback! The power of this project is sustained by the community! We believe that decentralization is the future and the society will have to adapt to crypto payment. There are already usecases out there in which you can pay in cryptos. Look at the impressive number of people already taking part of the crypto world. At our targets section: http://dlsacademy.io/ico/  we talk about attracting universities and partners in order to reach mainstream adoption.

Author: MikoS
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO] DLS Academy - Decentralized Learning System
Body: Thank you for your interest! During first week:     1 ETH = 17.500 DLT During second week: 1 ETH = 15.000 DLT During third week:    1 ETH = 12.500 DLT During fourth week:  1 ETH = 10.000 DLT Also is important not to forget the extra bonus of 30% for minimum contributions of 3eth. If you want to know the fiat value, if we relate to ETH being 300 USD and no bonuses were applied, 1 DLT equals 0.03 USD.

Author: MikoS
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO] DLS Academy - Decentralized Learning System
Body: Announcement! Donation for Mexico!  After the recent events in Mexico, DLS Academy decided today that 10% of the founders ether  raised during the ICO will be donated to charity! DLS Academy strives for a better education all over the world and supports it in good times and bad times as well!  At present time we contacted different NGOs like Unicef Mexic, Cruz Roja Mexicana and Save The Children Mexico in order to establish if a donation can be made using cryptocurrency!  We invite other businneses and companys to join in our efforts and to show the world the benefits of cryptocurrency!  If anyone has information about NGOs that accept donations using cryptocurrency please lets us know!
